title: What is proxy
description: Simply put, you recommend a product or service to your audience. If they buy based on your recommendation, the product owner pays you a cut of what they earned. When done ethically—meaning you only recommend tools you truly believe will help your audience—affiliate marketing is a great way to start generating an income for your business.
